messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the main goal of participants in the game?
to discover and foil some nefarious plot
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What controls the alien or hostile situation in the game?
an impartial Keeper
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can happen to investigators during the game?
they may become injured, suffer sanity-shattering experiences, or die
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the significance of a single investigator's death?
it means repulsing Cthulhu’s master plan to enslave the Earth
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the outcome of failing to achieve the investigators' goal?
Losing, they may be able to try again later.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can happen to the investigators during the game?
They may become injured, suffer sanity-shattering experiences, or even die!
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What does the survival of the investigators allow them to gain?
Power from arcane volumes of forgotten lore, knowledge of horrendous monsters, and advancement in their skills.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the ultimate goal of the investigators?
To repulsing Cthulhu's master plan to enslave the Earth!
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to investigators if they fail to achieve their goal?
Losing is what happens if they fail to achieve their goal.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What can investigators gain from surviving the game?
Investigators who survive will gain power from arcane volumes of forgotten lore, knowledge of horrendous monsters, and advancement in their skills.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the ultimate goal of investigators in the game?
Someone has to make a stand against the cosmic horrors of the universe and the death of a single investigator matters little if it means repulsing Cthulhu’s master plan to enslave the Earth!
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to investigators as they progress in the game?
Thus the players’ investigators will continue to progress, until their demise or retirement—whichever comes first.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to the players' investigators in a roleplaying game?
Their demise or retirement, whichever comes first.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the setting of the example game in the provided text?
The classic 1920s setting.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the goal of the investigators in the example game?
To find out why Boss Morgan, a notorious gangland figure, has vanished.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What type of setting does the example game use?
The classic 1920s setting.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is the notorious gangland figure that has vanished?
Boss Morgan.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Garrie's role in the game?
Keeper and is running the game.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Paula's plan to find clues?
Sneak around Boss Morgan's house.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is the Keeper in the game?
Garrie
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who will pick the lock on the back door?
Jake
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What time is the group leaving to approach Morgan's house?
Midnight
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What condition is the street under when the group arrives at Morgan's house?
It is pretty dark with two streetlights not working and no one in sight
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who can pick the lock on the back door?
Cathy's private eye Jake
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What did Cathy hear?
A creak of wood; sounds like the house's front door quietly opening
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who made a successful Listen roll?
Cathy
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who failed the Listen roll?
Joe
